synopsis: The tragic killing of a young boy ignites an all-out war in the community of Athena.
An assassin (Brad Pitt) is given the name Ladybug in an effort to put his streak of bad luck to rest
The film follows two women who climb a 2,000-foot tall radio tower and get stranded at the top with no way down.
Set during Bruce Wayne's (Robert Pattinson) early years, as he tries to figure out exactly how to be Batman.
